2010.query: Sprout Social social media management competitors 2010
2010.context: Sprout Social, Inc. is a social media management platform focused on social media publishing, analytics, and engagement. Founded for social media management for businesses.

competitors.name: Hootsuite
competitors.notes: Founded in 2008, veteran in social media management space, known for publishing and analytics features across multiple social media networks

competitors.name: Sprinklr
competitors.notes: Founded in 2010, customer experience management platform with social media management, engagement and data analytics

competitors.name: Meltwater
competitors.notes: Founded in 2001, serves over 27,000 customers, offers solutions for social media management and analytics

2015.query: Sprout Social competitors 2015 social media management
2015.context: Sprout Social, Inc. is a social media management platform focused on social media publishing, analytics, and engagement. Analytics and reporting expansion.

competitors.name: Hootsuite
competitors.notes: Founded in 2008, Hootsuite was the market leader and most widely recognized social media management platform. With millions of users ranging from individuals to enterprises, Hootsuite competed across all segments with its App Store ecosystem and broad feature set.

competitors.name: Buffer
competitors.notes: Founded in 2010, Buffer was a popular, user-friendly social media scheduling tool focused on simplicity and core publishing features. Buffer competed primarily on ease of use and pricing, targeting individuals and small businesses.

competitors.name: Sprinklr
competitors.notes: Enterprise-focused social media management platform serving large organizations. While in a different market segment, Sprinklr competed for larger Sprout Social customers as they scaled.

competitors.name: HubSpot Social Media Tools
competitors.notes: Social media management features integrated within HubSpot's inbound marketing and CRM platform, competing through bundled marketing automation capabilities.

competitors.name: Salesforce Social Studio
competitors.notes: Part of Salesforce Marketing Cloud, offering social media management integrated with Salesforce's broader marketing and CRM ecosystem for enterprises.

competitors.name: SocialFlow
competitors.notes: Social media optimization and publishing platform focused on maximizing engagement through algorithmic timing and optimization, popular with media companies and publishers.

competitors.name: CoSchedule
competitors.notes: Marketing calendar and social media scheduling tool, competing in the SMB and agency space with content marketing workflow features.

competitors.name: Sendible
competitors.notes: Social media management platform popular with agencies, offering white-label capabilities and client management features.

2020.query: Sprout Social social media management competitors 2020
2020.context: Sprout Social, Inc. is a social media management platform focused on social media publishing, analytics, and engagement. IPO. Employee advocacy and social listening.

competitors.name: Hootsuite
competitors.notes: All-in-one social media management platform with scheduling, employee advocacy, social listening, and community management features

competitors.name: Buffer
competitors.notes: Social media management tool for scheduling, publishing, and analyzing content across Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, Pinterest

competitors.name: Sprinklr
competitors.notes: AI-powered customer experience management platform with four main products: Sprinklr Service, Social, Insights, and Marketing

competitors.name: Khoros
competitors.notes: Multi-channel platform with content library, social listening, sentiment analysis, and integrated customer care functionalities

competitors.name: Dash Social
competitors.notes: Social media management platform focused on growth and performance for brands

competitors.name: Planable
competitors.notes: Best for agencies with focus on content management and collaboration

competitors.name: Agorapulse
competitors.notes: Platform with strong social inbox management capabilities

competitors.name: Statusbrew
competitors.notes: Platform known for advanced reporting features

competitors.name: Zoho Social
competitors.notes: Affordable social media management tool with smart scheduling, social listening, content calendar and detailed analytics reports

2024.context: Sprout Social, Inc. is a social media management platform focused on social media publishing, analytics, and engagement. AI-powered social media intelligence.

competitors.name: Hootsuite
competitors.notes: Most well-known competitor, founded 2008, cheaper pricing ($99 vs $249), best for larger enterprises with complex needs and global campaigns

competitors.name: Sprinklr
competitors.notes: Designed for large enterprises with extensive social media needs, more scalable and customizable than Sprout Social

competitors.name: Agorapulse
competitors.notes: Cost-effective alternative with advanced social inbox, customizable reporting, and more affordable pricing than Sprout Social

competitors.name: Sendible
competitors.notes: Social media management platform offering alternative to Sprout Social

competitors.name: Emplifi
competitors.notes: Social media management alternative to Sprout Social

competitors.name: Brandwatch
competitors.notes: Listed as competitor and alternative to Sprout Social

competitors.name: Zoho Social
competitors.notes: Budget-friendly option with smart scheduling, social listening, content calendar and detailed analytics

competitors.name: Later
competitors.notes: Visual-first approach with drag-and-drop calendar, perfect for Instagram and Pinterest, offers free plan and paid plans $15-80/month

competitors.name: Planable
competitors.notes: Strong team collaboration features with comments, real-time discussions, and multi-level content approval workflows

competitors.name: Sociality.io
competitors.notes: All-in-one platform for agencies and enterprise teams with strong analytics, deep competitor insights, no per-user fees

2025.context: Sprout Social, Inc. is a social media management platform focused on social media publishing, analytics, and engagement. Social media management leader. Competing with Hootsuite, Sprinklr.

competitors.name: Hootsuite
competitors.notes: Leading social media management platform for enterprises and agencies

competitors.name: Sprinklr
competitors.notes: Enterprise unified CXM platform with strong social capabilities

competitors.name: Buffer

competitors.name: Later (Mavrck)
competitors.notes: Visual content scheduling and influencer marketing platform

competitors.name: Brandwatch
competitors.notes: Social listening and consumer intelligence platform

competitors.name: Khoros
competitors.notes: Social media and community management for enterprises

competitors.name: Agorapulse
competitors.notes: Social media management with inbox and reporting features

competitors.name: Meltwater
competitors.notes: Media intelligence with social listening and analytics

mentionedBy.name: Sprinklr Inc.
